content.header: Looking for the right Email Developer?
description: I don't just code emails, I collaborate and develop strategic emails with your team to bring the best result.
Scroll down further to take a look.

paragraphs: Thank you for viewing my work, as you can see my goal is to develop impactful and engaging email campaigns.

I'm William Gregorio, it's a pleasure to meet you. My approach ensures that all emails adhere to regulations like CAN-SPAM, as well as accessibility standards such as WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines).

I can integrate email campaigns into custom web strategies, plus I have experience in developing and thinking outside the box, since you will need someone who is able to think and solve challenging obstacles that will return valuable results.

In summary, my attention to detail, adherence to best practices, and the willing to learn, ensures good results in email development. I find joy in the small things, as they often hold the most value and bring the best return.
